title: Fábrica – Cesar Mariano & Cia
comment:
ギターのリフと浮遊感あるグルーヴが印象的なブラジリアングルーヴ。
汽笛のような音色やシンセのレイヤーがじわじわと広がる、実験的かつコズミックな一曲。

A Brazilian groove marked by guitar riffs and a floating, weightless feel.
Whistle-like tones and layered synths gradually spread out, making for an experimental and cosmic track.
